entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should APICompat PackageValidation's EnableStrictModeForCompatibleTfms default to true? #33011

Closed

  • Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility.ValidatePackage task throws exception if PackageVersion has build metadata #28786
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Startup race condition #33007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Validate existing suppressions and remove unnecessary suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
